Regional mean probability ratio (PR) values over Central Asia for the responses of the daily maximum ( a) and minimum ( b) temperatures to the 1.5 °C, 2.0 °C, and
Δ
T
I N D C
global warming levels based on the percentile thresholds determined by the 1985–2005 climatology based on the multi-model ensemble mean. The dashed line represents a value of 1.0. The regional mean PR values for five subregions refer to Figure S2.
